title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Generative AI strategy: accelerating path to production (SMB307)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 生成式AI策略：加速生产路径 (SMB307)
abstract: Learn how to scale generative AI experiments into production-ready solutions. This session provides a strategic and technical framework for accelerating AI deployment while managing risks and maintaining governance. We'll cover practical approaches to align AI initiatives with business goals, establish evaluation criteria, and build effective teams. Through real-world examples, discover proven methods for fast-tracking implementation while ensuring security and quality. Gain actionable strategies for overcoming deployment challenges and creating repeatable processes that reduce time-to-value. Ideal for technology leaders focused on maximizing AI investments and driving enterprise adoption.
abstract_cn: 学习如何将生成式AI实验扩展为生产就绪的解决方案。本课程提供战略和技术框架，用于加速AI部署，同时管理风险并维护治理。我们将介绍实用方法，以使AI计划与业务目标保持一致、建立评估标准并组建高效团队。通过真实案例，探索经过验证的快速实施方法，同时确保安全性和质量。获取可操作的策略，以克服部署挑战并创建可重复的流程，从而缩短价值实现时间。适合专注于最大化AI投资和推动企业采用的技术领导者。
